abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of watchman is allowed

error.invalid_included_folders: included_folders should be a comma separated list of configuration folders
error.invalid_columns_width: Report column width should be a list of 3 positive integers
error.malformed_json: Notification action data should be a valid json dictionary
error.invalid_report_path: report file location is invalid, the path does not exist

data.ignored_states: Exclude entities with the states below from the report:
data.startup_delay: Startup delay for watchman sensors initialization

data_description.included_folders: Comma-separated list of folders where watchman should look for config files
data_description.ignored_items: Comma-separated list of entities and actions excluded from tracking
data_description.ignored_states: Comma-separated list of the states excluded from tracking
data_description.ignored_files: Comma-separated list of config files excluded from tracking
data_description.ignored_labels: Use labels to exclude entities from tracking
data_description.log_obfuscate: Whether to mask entity and action names in debug logs for privacy
data_description.exclude_disabled_automation: Exclude entities used only by disabled automations

data.columns_width: List of report columns width, e.g. 30, 7, 60
data.friendly_names: Add entity friendly names to the report

create_file.name: Create file report
create_file.description: Whether report file should be created (Usually True)

action.name: Send report as notification
action.description: Optional notification action to send report via (e.g. `persistent_notification.create`)

data.name: Notification action data parameters
data.description: Optional parameters for notification action (e.g. `title: Report`)

parse_config.name: Force configuration parsing
parse_config.description: Parse configuration files before generating the report. Usually, this is done automatically by Watchman, so this flag is typically not required.

chunk_size.name: Notification message chunk size
chunk_size.description: Maximum message size in bytes. Some notification services limit the maximum message size. If the report size exceeds chunk_size, it will be sent in multiple subsequent notifications.(optional)

set_ignored_labels.name: Set ignored labels
set_ignored_labels.description: Overwrite the list of labels to ignore.

deprecated_text_entity.title: Entity {entity_id} is deprecated
deprecated_text_entity.description: The use of `{entity_id}` is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Watchman. Please reconfigure your automations to use the `watchman.set_ignored_labels` action.
